text: Lymphomas Are Clonal by kappa Light Chain Rearrangement
PCR analysis of total spleen genomic DNA for the mouse kappa locus .
Primers were designed to amplify all V-J rearrangements , including VJ1 , VJ2 , VJ4 , and VJ5 .
Specific PCR products for the four rearrangements corresponding to the calculated sizes are indicated with arrows .
Bands of other sizes are due to non - specific products .
If a tumor was present in the background of normal spleen cells , a single band appears brighter than all the other specific bands .
Wild-type and <extra_id_0> LMP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transgenic lymphocytes are positive for all four V-J rearrangements and serve as positive controls .
Clonality is determined by the appearance of a predominant band at the correct size for a single V-J rearrangement .
